title: Tech's latest IPOs are getting demolished, with Robinhood, Rivian, UiPath down over 70% from offer price - CNBC
content: Tech's latest IPOs are getting demolished, with Robinhood, Rivian, UiPath down over 70% from offer price  CNBC
description: An ETF that tracks the most recent IPOs has lost almost 60% of its value since reaching a high in September.
